StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateOneRecruitHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@newDate date.me, @person_id int, @SeqNo int AS
DECLARE @PrevSeqNo int
IF EXISTS (SELECT PERSON_ID FROM M8412_Recruit_History WHERE Person_ID=@person_id AND sequence_no=@SeqNo) -- update current record (from) update M8412_Recruit_History set Billet_Begin_Date =@newDate where person_id =@person_id and sequence_no =@SeqNo
CREATE TABLE [#M8412_Recruit_History_Temp] ( [Person_ID] [int] NOT NULL , [Sequence_No] [int] NOT NULL , [Billet_Begin_Date] [date.me] NULL , [Billet_End_Date] [date.me] NULL )
INSERT #M8412_Recruit_History_Temp SELECT Person_ID, Sequence_No, Billet_Begin_Date, Billet_End_Date FROM M8412_Recruit_History WHERE Person_ID = @person_id ORDER BY Person_ID, Billet_Begin_Date desc
DECLARE @CUR_PERSON_ID int, @CUR_Sequence_No int DECLARE @CUR_Billet_Begin_Date date.me, @CUR_Billet_End_Date date.me, @CUR_Billet_New_End_Date date.me
DECLARE BILLET_CUR CURSOR FOR SELECT Person_ID, Sequence_No, Billet_Begin_Date, Billet_End_Date FROM #M8412_Recruit_History_Temp
OPEN BILLET_CUR
-- Get the .rst record FETCH BILLET_CUR INTO @CUR_PERSON_ID, @CUR_Sequence_No, @CUR_Billet_Begin_Date, @CUR_Billet_End_Date IF @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN SET @CUR_Billet_New_End_Date = @CUR_Billet_Begin_Date END
-- Get the rest FETCH BILLET_CUR INTO @CUR_PERSON_ID, @CUR_Sequence_No, @CUR_Billet_Begin_Date, @CUR_Billet_End_Date WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
UPDATE M8412_Recruit_History SET Billet_End_Date = @CUR_Billet_New_End_Date WHERE Person_ID = @CUR_PERSON_ID AND Sequence_No = @CUR_Sequence_No
SET @CUR_Billet_New_End_Date = @CUR_Billet_Begin_Date FETCH BILLET_CUR INTO @CUR_PERSON_ID, @CUR_Sequence_No, @CUR_Billet_Begin_Date, @CUR_Billet_End_Date END
CLOSE BILLET_CUR
DEALLOCATE BILLET_CUR DROP TABLE #M8412_Recruit_History_Temp
-- 05/17/07 S.Kho Replace/Update te billet begin date in the background informa.on -- sec.on with the informa.on from the most recent billet in the billet history.
DECLARE @TBillet VARCHAR(25) , @TBDate DATETIME , @TLocID INT , @TLoc VARCHAR(20)
SET @TBillet=' ' SELECT TOP 1 @TBillet = Billet , @TBDate=Billet_Begin_Date , @TLocID =Loca.on_ID, @TLoc = Loca.on FROM M8412_Recruit_History WHERE Person_ID = @person_id ORDER BY Billet_Begin_Date DESC
IF (ISNULL(LEN(@TBillet),0)!=0) BEGIN UPDATE M8412_Recruit_Person SET Billet=@TBillet ,Date_Billet=@TBDate , Loca.on_ID = @TLocID , Current_Loca.on=@TLoc , Modi.ed_Date=GETDATE() -- , Modi.ed_By=@UserID WHERE Person_ID = @person_id END
